introduction: Full-stack developer with 4 years of experience building scalable blockchain web applications using React, TypeScript, and Node.js . Passionate about building secure and user-centric products. My experience includes developing an NFT platform and creating an Ethereum-based Asset-Backed Token platform to tokenize real-world assets. I am excited about leveraging my expertise to drive innovation in the NFT space and push the boundaries of Web3 technologies.

workExperience.title: Front-End Developer
description: Technical Lead: Spearheaded the creation of a blockchain paperless trade platform, integrating Web3 APIs to ensure tamper-proof records, securing a 20M CNY grant from Shenzhen Government.
Product Architect: Designed and implemented an internal 3D NFT platform for the company's anniversary using React, Threejs and Go, serving over 1,000 clients with a 96% satisfaction rate.

Web3 contribution: Implemented secure smart contracts for tokenization of real-world assets using Solidity and Ethereum. Developed a custom wallet module, integrated with Ethereum, supporting seamless user transactions.
AWS Experience: Deployed containerized applications using AWS ECS and managed image repositories with AWS ECR, ensuring efficient deployment pipelines.
Patents: Earned 4 national patents for technological innovations, including the integration of WebAssembly for automated signature verification.

coursesAndInfo: Key Courses: Applied Investments, Data Analysis, Risk Management
Key Courses: Database basics, Mathematics and Algorithms, Financial Engineering
National Computer Rank Examination Level 2 Certificate in Python

skills.title: Frontend
skills.value: React, Vue, Nextjs, TypeScript, Three.js, Jest, Cypress

projects.title: NFT Platform
description: Designed and implemented a 3D NFT platform for the company's anniversary, supporting the minting and transfer of digital assets.
Proposed and integrated Three.js to enhance user experience and interactivity, enabling immersive 3D visualization of NFTs, which received highly positive feedback from users.
Participated in troubleshooting backend code using go and mysql, ensuring robust querying capabilities.

projects.title: Asset-Backed Tokenization Platform
description: Designed and implemented a blockchain platform enabling financial asset digitization and trading in secondary markets.
Built front-end interfaces with Vue.js and TypeScript, integrating blockchain data via Web3.js.
Developed customized wallets to facilitate blockchain interactions, and developed smart contracts using solidity to enable asset tokenization.

projects.title: Cross-Border Paperless Trade Platform
description: Developed a blockchain-based platform for digitizing cross-border trade documents, ensuring tamper-proof records and transparency.
Integrated Tradetrust and OpenAttestation libraries and utilized smart contract calls to enable secure wrapping, signing, and verification processes.
